class EpikCord.Activity(*, name: str, type: int, url: Optional[str] = None)

Bases: object

Represents a Discord Activity object.

namestr

The name of the activity.

typeint

The type of the activity.

urlOptional[str]

The url of the activity. Only available for the streaming activity

to_dict()

Returns activity class as dict

payloaddict

The dict representation of the Activity.

InvalidData

You tried to set an url for a non-streaming activity.

class EpikCord.ClientUserCommand(*, name: str, callback: Callable)

Bases: EpikCord.BaseCommand

A class to represent a User Command that the Client owns.

  • name The name set for the User Command

  • callback: callable The function to call for the User Command

(Passed in by the library)

All parameters follow the documentation of the Attributes accordingly

  • callback

class EpikCord.WelcomeScreenChannel(data: dict)

Bases: object

EpikCord.b64encode(s, altchars=None)

Encode the bytes-like object s using Base64 and return a bytes object.

Optional altchars should be a byte string of length 2 which specifies an alternative alphabet for the ‘+’ and ‘/’ characters. This allows an application to e.g. generate url or filesystem safe Base64 strings.
